messages.content: So… you don’t want to vote Tory, but neither Labour nor the Lib Dems appeal? There’s another option, Vote Green. If you support more funds for the NHS and schools; scrapping Southern’s rail franchise; protecting the countryside; and opposing a disastrous “hard” Brexit, vote Green. My kids are in Horsham schools and I run my business here. Unlike our current MP, I only have one house and have always lived in Horsham. Our area needs more younger, female representatives – reflecting its population. For a fairer future, vote Green.

The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizens’ democracy.

If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it’s in your hands. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters. Vote Green Party on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is offering real opposition to the Government’s extreme Brexit, promoting an alternative future for the country both locally and globally.
A vision to shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment, including building affordable homes and providing properly funded public services.
